doc.field: - United Medical Corp said it it has requested a meeting of holders of its Swiss Francs 30 mln 5-1/8 pct convertible subordinated notes due 1991. The meeting has been requested in order to amend the negative pledge and financial covenants which have proved to be too restrictive in light of the company's activities, it said. United also said it plans to acquire some of these notes to reduce its exposure to foreign exchange fluctuations.
